title: Nikudore Shigan
description:
From Tadanohito:

This is a collection of short series and one-shots with a variety of themes, but all with cutely drawn women with well rounded cute bodies and giant, marshmallow-like boobs. Often the theme is one gender forcing themselves on the other, so aggressive guys or girls. There is a three-part series which is about a douchebag fat guy who gets his way with women, but of course they end up liking it. There is a mother-daughter chapter, a nerd club three-parter, and a few nice short color chapters. Light censorship.

1. Summer Ferris Wheel Bang

2. Dripping Wet Onee-sama

3. Lost and Found

4. Sex Slave Volunteer

5. 5 YEARS AFTER

6-8. Paradise Wall

9. Memories of Japan

10-12. Admission Experience
